Commands.Sneak Slash: 1-HIT melee BRV attack  Greatly increases BRV damage dealt when attacking an enemy not targeting self  Grants 「Thief's Gloves」 for 3 turns   While 「Thief's Gloves」 is active:  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「Mug」  　∟ 1-HIT melee BRV attack  　∟ Low Action Delay  　∟ Dispels previously granted 「Genji Gloves」, 「Miracle Shoes」  　∟ Randomly grants either 「Genji Gloves」 or 「Miracle Shoes」 for 5 turns   「Thief’s Gloves」 raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed   「Genji Gloves」 raises Attack   「Miracle Shoes」 has the following effects:  - Raises Speed  - Lowers BRV damage taken  - Grants BRV regen
Commands.Phoenix Ray: 1-HIT AoE ranged BRV+HP attack  HP Damage is split equally amongst all enemies
Commands.Item Steal: Dispels 1 of the target's buffs  Cancels existing 「Genji's Gloves」 and 「Miracle Shoes」  Randomly grants 「Genji's Gloves」 or 「Miracle Shoes」 for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Mirage Dive: 7-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Grants 「Treasure Hunter」 for 6 turns   「Treasure Hunter」 has the following effects:  - Raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed  - Restores either BRV or HP after own turn ends

Passives.Sneak Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Sneak Slash ,  Sneak Slash+
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Phoenix Ray Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Phoenix Ray
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self
Passives.In Search of Treasure: Slightly raises Attack and Speed for 5 turns when attacking an enemy not targeting self
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed All: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Sneak Slash Extend: Sneak Slash  use +2When using  Sneak Slash :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 3- Tremendously raises its total potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Extends the duration of  Thief's Gloves  by 1 turn- Triggers an HP attack after useAfter use,  Sneak Slash  turns to  Sneak Slash+  with the following effects:- If the target is hit, moves the user's next turn right before the target's turn (except during Summon)- Cancels existing  Genji's Gloves  and  Miracle Shoes - Randomly grants  Genji's Gloves  or  Miracle Shoes  for 6 turns- Reverts back to  Sneak Slash  after useWhen using  Mug :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2.- Moderately raises its total potency- Extends of duration of  Genji's Gloves  or  Miracle Shoes  by 1 turnWhen using  HP Attack+ (Genji Gloves) :- Greatly raises its potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRVWhen using  HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes) :- Greatly raises its potency- Doesn't increase turn count- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Phoenix Ray Extend: Phoenix Ray  use +1When using  Phoenix Ray :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 3- Tremendously raises its total potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Power: Raises Initial BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Item Steal Extend: When using  Item Steal :- Halves target's BRV and adds it to self BRV

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Item Steal  use +1Duration of buffs granted by  Item Steal  +2 turns
Weapons.Main Gauche CP: 15: When using  Sneak Slash ,  Sneak Slash+ :- Raises BRV potency- Improves the effects of  Thief's Gloves  and extends its duration
Weapons.Assassin's Dagger CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Mirage Dive
Weapons.Thief's Knife CP: 35: When using  Phoenix Ray :- Raises party BRV based on Attack- Raises BRV potency- Restores party HP based on HP damage dealt up to 20% of Max HP
